library(ggplot2)

## Legends

----------------------------

### `theme()`：
```{r}
n + theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

### `guides()`：
```{r}
n + guides(fill = "none")
```

### `scale_fill_discrete()`：
```{r}
n + scale_fill_discrete(
  name = "Title",
  labels = c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E")
)
```
